channel.title: Help with maxing a stat out
channel.description: Hello i need help maxing out the attack at 83 the str at 69 and hp at 80 does anyone know how to do this?

item.title: Help with maxing a stat out
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Fine, Do all the above except replace it with

addSkillXP(14075000, 1);
addSkillXP(14075000, 2);

I think those are attack and str. But it gets you to 99 instead of the ones you wanted. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with maxing a stat out
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

::master command, Really simple, In client.java Look for

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

Then Below that you should see something like not necessary like this

if (command.startsWith("home")) {
teleportToX = 3242;
teleportToY = 3517;
}

Now Below the } Place this in

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && (playerRights >= 0))
addSkillXP(14075000, 0);
addSkillXP(14075000, 1);
addSkillXP(14075000, 2);
addSkillXP(14075000, 3);
addSkillXP(14075000, 4);
addSkillXP(14075000, 5);
addSkillXP(14075000, 6);
addSkillXP(14075000, 7);
addSkillXP(14075000, 8);
addSkillXP(14075000, 9);
addSkillXP(14075000, 10);
addSkillXP(14075000, 11);
addSkillXP(14075000, 12);
addSkillXP(14075000, 13);
addSkillXP(14075000, 14);
addSkillXP(14075000, 15);
addSkillXP(14075000, 16);
addSkillXP(14075000, 17);
addSkillXP(14075000, 18);
addSkillXP(14075000, 19);
addSkillXP(14075000, 20);
addSkillXP(14075000, 21);
addSkillXP(14075000, 22);
addSkillXP(14075000, 23);
addSkillXP(14075000, 24);
sendMessage("Type a message here");
}

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with maxing a stat out

item.title: Help with maxing a stat out
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Ignored my pms. Pfft.
Change the max XP to an XP at lvl 83.
Ex: 83 starts at 2mil XP, and you go to 84 at 2.5mil XP, you’d make the max 2.3mil XP.

Then you would do something like this:

if (playerLevel[2] > 69) {
playerLevel[2] = 69; }

But you’d have to do that for every skill

Read full topic
